title: 权限组配置EX
author: 论坛好网友
txt_content:
RT








permissions.yml


2017-6-2 22:13 上传
点击文件名下载附件




1.84 KB, 下载次数: 15

replies.author: 浅念哥
replies.txt_content:
groups:
  Builder:
    options:
      default: false
    permissions:
    - essentials.builder*
    - lookitem.use  
    - chestcommands.open.cd.yml
    - chestcommands.open.1.yml
    - chestcommands.open.2.yml
    - chestcommands.open.3.yml
    - chestcommands.open.4.yml
    - chestcommands.open.5.yml
    - chestcommands.open.6.yml
    - chestcommands.item.7.yml
    - chestcommands.item.\u98ce\u666f.yml      
    - citizens.npc
    - -essentials.warps.*
    - -essentials.warp.*
    - -essentials.hat
    - -essentials.home
    - -essentials.tpa
    - -essentials.tpahere
    - -essentials.help
    - -essentials.afk
    - -essentials.back
    - -essentials.chat.color
    - -essentials.delhome
    - -essentials.kit.*
    - -essentials.kits.*
    - -essentials.helpop
    - -essentials.msg.*
    - -essentials.message.*
    - -essentials.sethome
    - -essentials.sell
    - -essentials.suicide
    - -essentials.tpaccept
  xnhz:    
    inheritance:
    - default
    permissions:
    - essentials.builder*    
    - LoginMessage.4
    - pvpperms.2    
    options:
      suffix:    
  zzdg:
    inheritance:
    - default
    permissions:
    - essentials.builder*    
    - LoginMessage.5
    - pvpperms.5
    options:
      suffix:  
  dssz: 
    inheritance:
    - default
    permissions:
    - essentials.builder*   
    - LoginMessage.1
    - pvpperms.4    
    options:
      suffix:  
  bjlz:    
    inheritance:
    - default
    permissions:  
    - essentials.builder*  
    - LoginMessage.2
    - pvpperms.3    
    options:
      suffix:    
  nzbz:      
    inheritance:
    - default
    permissions:  
    - essentials.builder*    
    options:
      suffix:    
  Default:
    options:
      default: true
    permissions:
    - scriptblock.interact.use
    - scriptblock.walk.use    
    options:
      suffix:"&e&4[\u7075\u9b42\u72b6\u6001\u7684]&2"复制代码
Default组下options格式不正确。
